articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump to visit mass shooting sites amid criticism
articles.description: The US president heads to Ohio and Texas with his actions and language under close scrutiny.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Taliban bomb Kabul amid peace talk 'progress'
articles.description: Dozens are injured in a car bombing just days after progress was claimed in US-Taliban talks.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Tweeting bureaucrat loses landmark Australian case
articles.description: A public servant was fairly sacked for anonymously criticising the government, a court rules.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Ancient parrot half the size of humans discovered
articles.description: The parrot roamed New Zealand 19 million years ago, and may have been flightless and carnivorous.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Lewinsky to co-produce Clinton impeachment film
articles.description: The latest series of the fact-based drama will air in the run-up to 2020's presidential election.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Couple posts photos before and after beating meth addiction
articles.description: The before-and-after pictures have been shared 140,000 times on Facebook.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: No-deal Brexit: How might it affect the EU?
articles.description: The BBC's Adam Fleming explains what a no-deal Brexit might mean for the 27 EU countries.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump sues California over tax return law
articles.description: The law says presidential candidates must file tax returns in order to stand in primaries.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Nigerian star Tekno held for pole dance in traffic
articles.description: He insists he was just moving from one location to another during the filming of his music video.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Kashmiris express anger at loss of special status
articles.description: Communications in the state have been cut off, and locals tell the BBC people are shocked and angry.
